mati the malay word the meaning i

James you know it well would say that
it's a well chosen location and it's

think there's a certain genius as you

has everything that Donald Trump likes
it's got world-class golf courses it's
based on gambling and property

people I think he's going to be
surprisingly comfortable and the serious
point behind that is you know Trump is
an instinctive man and what happens
today a lot depends upon how he's
feeling does he wake up in a good mood
or a bad mood is he comfortable in his
surrounding does he feel good about
things he's very instinctive and so if
he really hates the place that he's been
put in and that's a very bad sign
because he'll get grumpy and so I think
Sentosa at the margin is actually a very
wise choice because I think he'll feel
very comfortable there - very like Mara
Lago his home that he loves in Florida
it's that lush vegetation that
I remember so well and it so perfectly
